label: 冠位十二階
本: The Acceptance of the Ritsuryo Codes and the Chinese System of Rites in Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 99 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2010-08
説明文: The system of twelve grades of cap ranks that was initially instituted in Japan in the eleventh year of Suiko's reign (603) excluded from the outset the royal family and members of the Soga 蘇我 family, who held power in the court at the time.
